validate_non_zero_l1_gas_fee.description: If true, validates transactions have non zero L1 resource bounds.

validate_non_zero_l2_gas_fee.description: If true, validates transactions have non zero L2 resource bounds.

max_calldata_length.description: Validates transactions have calldata length less than or equal to this value.

max_signature_length.description: Validates transactions have signature length less than or equal to this value.
